org.apache.james.mailbox.model

Class MailboxQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.mailbox.model.MailboxQuery

  • public final class MailboxQuery
extends Object
    Expresses select criteria for mailboxes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char FREEWILDCARD
      Use this wildcard to match every char including the hierarchy delimiter
      static char LOCALWILDCARD
      Use this wildcard to match every char except the hierarchy delimiter

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MailboxQuery(MailboxPath base, String expression, char pathDelimiter)
      Constructs an expression determining a set of mailbox names.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MailboxQuery

        public MailboxQuery(MailboxPath base,
            String expression,
            char pathDelimiter)
        Constructs an expression determining a set of mailbox names.
        Parameters:
        base - base reference name, not null
        expression - mailbox match expression, not null
        pathDelimiter - path delimiter to use

    • Method Detail

      • getExpression

        public final String getExpression()
        Gets the name search expression. This may contain wildcards.
        Returns:
        the expression

      • getFreeWildcard

        public final char getFreeWildcard()
        Gets wildcard character that matches any series of characters.
        Returns:
        the freeWildcard

      • getLocalWildcard

        public final char getLocalWildcard()
        Gets wildcard character that matches any series of characters excluding hierarchy delimiters. Effectively, this means that it matches any sequence within a name part.
        Returns:
        the localWildcard

      • isExpressionMatch

        public final boolean isExpressionMatch(String name)
        Is the given name a match for getExpression()?
        Parameters:
        name - name to be matched
        Returns:
        true if the given name matches this expression, false otherwise

      • getCombinedName

        public String getCombinedName()
        Get combined name formed by adding the expression to the base using the given hierarchy delimiter. Note that the wildcards are retained in the combined name.
        Returns:
        getBase() combined with getExpression(), notnull

      • isWild

        public boolean isWild()
        Is this expression wild?
        Returns:
        true if wildcard contained, false otherwise

        public String toString()
        Renders a string suitable for logging.

        Returns:
        a String representation of this object.
